metadata.title: CVE-2024-24479 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.description: Buffer Overflow vulnerability in Wireshark team Wireshark before v.4.2.0allows a remote attacker to cause a denial of service via thewsutil/to_str.c, and format_fractional_part_nsecs components.

criterions.comment: wireshark package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
